name: Less becomes more
description:
Controls:

WASD = Movement

Left Mouse = Shooting

POWERUPS: 

Lightning for Speed.

Heart for life back.

This is my first Game Jam and when I heard of the theme: Less is more. I couldn't think of something instantly. 

My idea came to me when I saw a news article about the british Corona variant entering houses in the Netherlands as well. This gave me an idea. Since Virusses duplicate, it made me think of Less Becomes More.

Little adaptation to what the theme suggests. But I think it fits it nonetheless.

Credits to: Kenney Assets for using the Tilesheet.

Credits to: Youtube Library for providing the music.
